text:

creator: ragaller@apache.org

text: Markus just informed me that this bug is related to the cocoon problem already filed in cocoon jira.
creator: ragaller@apache.org

text: Can you confirm that this has been fixed in RC4?
creator: rfrovarp@apache.org
andreas@apache.org
text:
(In reply to comment #2)
> Can you confirm that this has been fixed in RC4?

It works for me in RC4.
